Japan's Nippon Steel China assets under scrutiny over US Steel deal, Bloomberg reportsThe Biden administration is examining Nippon Steel's China connection, in relation to the Japanese company's planned acquisition of American rival U.S. Steel , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.
